entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:13 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:16 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
